items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Bharti Airtel, Tata Motors, Dalmia Bharat Sugar, Metropolis, ITD Cementation, ASK Automotive, Bharti Hexacom in focus on 14 May
items.description: Stocks to watch, 14 May: Stocks like AurionPro Solutions,VST Tillers Tractors,VIP Industries,Honeywell Automation,GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals, Metropolis Healthcare, ITD Cementation India, Max Financial Services, Garden Reach Shipbuilders & Engineers, ASK Automotive, Bharti Airtel,Tata Motors,Dalmia Bharat Sugar and Industries, and Bharti Hexacom will be in focus on May 14.

items.title: First Tick: Here are the top global cues for today’s trade
items.description: The Foreign institutional investors (FIIs) sold equities worth Rs 476  crore on May 13, while Domestic institutional investors (DIIs) extended their buying on third day as they bought equities of Rs 4,273 crore on the same day.
